analysis.description:
Reentrancy in BTFCrowdsale.getTokenForTeam (/unique_chucks/21/0xc7f75a9e09739d74928f6ed0d13c1d53af8d4f9c.sol):
	External calls:
	- decimals = BlockchainTradedFund(token).decimals() (/unique_chucks/21/0xc7f75a9e09739d74928f6ed0d13c1d53af8d4f9c.sol)
	- token.mint(beneficiary,amountGranted) (/unique_chucks/21/0xc7f75a9e09739d74928f6ed0d13c1d53af8d4f9c.sol)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- tokenForTeamGranted (/unique_chucks/21/0xc7f75a9e09739d74928f6ed0d13c1d53af8d4f9c.sol)

BTFCrowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/21/0xc7f75a9e09739d74928f6ed0d13c1d53af8d4f9c.sol#361-375) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/21/0xc7f75a9e09739d74928f6ed0d13c1d53af8d4f9c.sol#373-374)

BTFCrowdsale.getTokenForTeam (/unique_chucks/21/0xc7f75a9e09739d74928f6ed0d13c1d53af8d4f9c.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,amountGranted) (/unique_chucks/21/0xc7f75a9e09739d74928f6ed0d13c1d53af8d4f9c.sol)
